name: Double Chamber

nodes.name: Direct G-Mode Junction, Prepared Remote Acquire (Bottom Right)
nodes.note: Represents being at the bottom right with G-Mode and overloaded PLMs. The item must have been touched or previously been collected.

nodes.name: G-Mode Junction (Bottom Right)
nodes.note: Represents being at the bottom right with G-Mode and Morph.
nodes.devNote: This can only be used for strats that can be done with either indirect or direct and PLMs overloaded or not.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharging, Leave With Temporary Blue
Indirect G-Mode, Despawn Gate
strats.note: With Grapple, a running jump then single Grapple swing can be used before PLMs are overloaded, alternatively jump on the crumble blocks and Grapple the Ripper.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode Morph, Despawn Gate, IBJ
note: Bomb boost onto the crumble blocks in the middle of the spike pit, then on the right side, move the Ripper off camera and IBJ.
If the camera gets shifted so that the Ripper stays on camera, shift it back to the right by IBJng up a bit on the left side of the 4 crumbles then move to the right as Samus falls.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Through the Crumbles
strats.note: Overload PLMs by shooting the gate, then go through the crumble blocks below and get to the door.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Through the Crumbles, IBJ
note: Overload PLMs by bombing the gate or crumble blocks, then go through the crumble blocks below and get to the door.
IBJ past the Ripper or kill it. The Kago bugs will not spawn until Samus exits G-mode, so it is fine to kill it or IBJ from on top of it.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode, Despawn Gate, Open Gate
strats.note: Stand under where the gate will spawn when exiting G-mode to open it before grabbing the item.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Through the Crumbles
strats.note: Overload PLMs by shooting the gate, then go through the crumble blocks below and get to the item.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Through the Crumbles, IBJ
note: Overload PLMs by bombing the gate or crumble blocks, then go through the crumble blocks below and get to the item.
IBJ past the Ripper or kill it. The Kago bugs will not spawn until Samus exits G-mode, so it is fine to kill it or IBJ from on top of it.

strats.name: Walljump Climb Using the Kamer
note: Wall jump up the left wall and then on the moving platform (Kamer) while avoiding the Fune's fireball.
The Kamers will temporarily move down if Samus is below them, so it is best to walk under the first Kamer before climbing the wall.
It is possible to freeze or kill the Fune with a Super or Power Bomb to make things easier.

strats.name: Walljump Climb Using the Kamer with HiJump
note: Wall jump up the left wall and then on the moving platform (Kamer) while avoiding the Fune's fireball.
The Kamers will temporarily move down if Samus is below them, so it is best to walk under the first Kamer before climbing the wall.

strats.name: Delayed Walljump
strats.note: Wall jump up the left wall, perform a delayed wall jump on the Fune to reach the door.

strats.name: Shinespark Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 1 screen.

strats.name: G-Mode Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 1 screen.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Speedjump
strats.note: Run from the right wall to 2/3 of the way across the room and jump up onto the moving platforms.

strats.name: Tricky Dash Jump
note: Run under the second moving platform from the right to trigger it to move down.
Then run back to the left wall, run again to the right, and jump when on the center of the mound just to the right below the platform.

strats.name: Cross Room HiJump Spring Ball Jump
note: Spin jump into the room with at least 1 tile of run speed.
Then perform a mid-air Spring Ball jump to reach the ledge above.

strats.name: Cross Room Tricky Spring Ball Jump
note: Spin jump into the room with at least 1 tile of run speed.
Perform a lateral mid-air morph into a spring ball jump.
Press against the left side of the first moving platform to gain enough height to get on top of it.

strats.name: Leave With Temporary Blue (HiJump, Spring Ball Jump)
Blue Cross-Room Jump, Leave With Temporary Blue (HiJump, Spring Ball Jump)
Blue Cross-Room Jump, Leave With Temporary Blue (Speedy Jump, HiJump)
Blue Cross-Room Jump, Leave With Temporary Blue (Speedy Jump, Spring Ball Jump)
Tricky Grapple Jump

blocks.note: The Moat, Double Chamber, Wrecked Ship Energy Tank Room

devNote: The Kamers make this tricky since it's easy to bonk on them.

strats.name: G-Mode
strats.note: It is possible to climb the left side of the room with SpeedBooster alone, with either a tricky dash jump or a vertical shinespark.
strats.devNote: This is only for strats without Morph, otherwise the strats can stop at 7 first.

strats.name: Leave With Side Platform
devNote: Max extra run speed $5.0

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode, Despawn Gate
note: It is possible to climb the left side of the room with SpeedBooster alone, with either a tricky dash jump or a vertical shinespark, then Grapple the Ripper or ceiling blocks.
With Grapple, a running jump then single Grapple swing can be used before PLMs are overloaded, alternatively jump on the crumble blocks and Grapple the Ripper.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode Morph, Despawn Gate, IBJ
note: Bomb boost onto the crumble blocks in the middle of the spike pit, then on the right side, move the Ripper off camera and IBJ.
If the camera gets shifted so that the Ripper stays on camera, shift it back to the right by IBJng up a bit on the left side of the 4 crumbles then move to the right as Samus falls.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Through the Crumbles
note: Overload PLMs by shooting the gate, then go through the crumble blocks below and get to the door.
The gate can be shot while precisely positioned from below without requiring any items.
The positioning is precise and off camera; while facing left, position Samus front foot barely on the flat part after the slope.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Through the Crumbles, IBJ
note: Overload PLMs by bombing the gate or crumble blocks, then go through the crumble blocks below and get to the door.
IBJ past the Ripper or kill it. The Kago bugs will not spawn until Samus exits G-mode, so it is fine to kill it or IBJ from on top of it.

strats.name: HiJump Wall Jump
strats.note: Run to the right, wait a moment for the platforms to come down, then wall jump off the second platform from the right.

strats.name: Tricky Dash Jump
note: Run under the furthest right moving platform to trigger it to move down.
Then run back to the left wall, run again to the right, and jump when on the center of the mound just to the left below the platform.
Shoot straight up to open the gate on the way up.

strats.name: Tricky Dash Jump Wall Jump
note: Starting from the left wall, run to the right and when on the center of the mound just to the right of the second moving platform from the right.
Wall jump off of the platform as it moves down.

strats.name: Cross Room HiJump Wall Jump
strats.note: Jump through the door transition, and wall jump off the second moving platform to get on top.

strats.name: Cross Room Tricky Spring Ball Jump
note: Spin jump into the room with at least 2 tiles of run speed.
Perform a lateral mid-air morph into a spring ball jump.
Land on the second moving platform.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode, Despawn Gate
strats.note: It is possible to climb the left side of the room with SpeedBooster alone, with either a tricky dash jump or a vertical shinespark.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode, Despawn Gate, Open Gate
strats.note: Stand under where the gate will spawn when exiting G-mode to open it before grabbing the item.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode Morph, Despawn Gate, Open Gate
strats.note: Stand under where the gate will spawn when exiting G-mode to open it before grabbing the item.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Through the Crumbles
note: Overload PLMs by shooting the gate, then go through the crumble blocks below and get to the item.
The gate can be shot while precisely positioned from below without requiring any items.
The positioning is precise and off camera; while facing left, position Samus front foot barely on the flat part after the slope.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Through the Crumbles, IBJ
note: Overload PLMs by bombing the gate or crumble blocks, then go through the crumble blocks below and get to the item.
IBJ past the Ripper or kill it. The Kago bugs will not spawn until Samus exits G-mode, so it is fine to kill it or IBJ from on top of it.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport X-Ray Climb
note: Exit the previous room with Samus in a standing pose (while grappled) with a horizontal position of 21 (as far right as possible).
After teleporting, press right to release Grapple while staying standing (not being forced into a crouch).
Then X-ray climb 1 screen to get up to the door transition, without needing to open the door.
Samus will not be visible during the climb.
At the beginning of the climb, avoid pressing left without X-Ray being held, to prevent triggering the transition of the bottom door.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Remote Acquire
note: Bomb horizontally on room entry to jump over the Ripper and land on the crumble blocks, or use a Power Bomb to kill the Ripper.
Avoid touching all 6 crumbles, so Samus can use the item to overload PLMs and go through one of the crumbles to get to the left side of the room.
If the item has already been obtained, Samus can shoot or Bomb the gate many times to overload PLMs.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode, Despawn the Gate
note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to cross the room.
With Grapple, a running jump then single Grapple swing can be used before PLMs are overloaded, alternatively jump on the crumble blocks and Grapple the Ripper.
strats.devNote: This is only for strats that can't go to 7 - variants without Morph, or without a way to get back up after going down.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode Morph, Despawn the Gate
strats.note: Bomb horizontally on room entry to jump over the Ripper and land on the crumble blocks, or use a Power Bomb to kill the Ripper.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Remote Acquire
note: Bomb horizontally on room entry to jump over the Ripper and land on the crumble blocks, or use a Power Bomb to kill the Ripper.
Avoid touching all 6 crumbles, so Samus can use the item to overload PLMs and go through one of the crumbles to get to the left side of the room.
If the item has already been obtained, Samus can shoot or Bomb the gate many times to overload PLMs.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode, Despawn the Gate
note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to cross the room.
With Grapple, a running jump then single Grapple swing can be used before PLMs are overloaded, alternatively jump on the crumble blocks and Grapple the Ripper.
strats.devNote: This is only for strats that can't go to 7 - variants without Morph.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode Morph, Despawn the Gate
strats.note: Bomb horizontally on room entry to jump over the Ripper and land on the crumble blocks, or use a Power Bomb to kill the Ripper.

blocks.note: Closest Grapple block to the door

strats.name: Ripper Farm
strats.devNote: FIXME: It is possible but risky to farm using hijump, walljump, and crumble jumps.

strats.name: Shinespark through Wave Beam Door (Top Path)
note: Charge a spark along the bottom of the room and use it to spark through the right side door.
Requires opening the door and shutter first.
devNote: A hero shot variation of this strat might be possible, starting from a node to the left;
if nothing else it could be done with a shortcharge on the 12-tile platform to the left.

strats.name: Shinespark through Wave Beam Door (Through Crumbles)
note: Charge a spark along the bottom of the room and use it to spark through the right side door.
Requires opening the door and shutter first.

strats.name: XMode with Walljump
strats.note: Jump into the spikes and try to bounce on the crumble blocks moving towards the door.
strats.devNote: Three spike hits are expected per attempt (with any additional leniency hits being multiplied by this amount).

strats.name: XMode with HiJump, Leave Shinecharged
strats.note: Jump into the spikes and try to bounce on the crumble blocks moving towards the door.
devNote: Three spike hits are expected per attempt (with any additional leniency hits being multiplied by this amount).
FIXME: It is possible to do this with two, is it reasonable?

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Remote Acquire Item
strats.note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to cross the room.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Remote Acquire Item, Kill the Ripper then IBJ
strats.note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to cross the room.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Remote Acquire Item
strats.note: Bomb horizontally on room entry to jump over the Ripper and land on the crumble blocks, or use a Power Bomb to kill the Ripper.

strats.name: Ripper I-Frames, Spike Jump
note: Run off or perform a short hop off the ledge into the Ripper and damage boost to the left of the spikes.
Using the i-frames from the Ripper, quickly jump from the spikes to the item.
With HiJump, it is also possible to avoid the damage boost and land right of the crumble blocks and get a good jump to the left.
devNote: FIXME: It is possible to avoid the Ripper and jump off of the crumble blocks.
With a Spring Ball jump, this requires an very precise jump and very quick pause to get as much horizontal speed as possible before the second jump.
With HiJump + Wall Jump, it is possible to crumble spin jump from the first crumbles to the second crumbles and then wall jump.

strats.name: Shinespark (Come in with Spark)
strats.devNote: The item will not be forced to be collected if the spark was in the top position.

strats.name: Hijumpless Spike Speedjump

failures.name: Crumble Fall
failures.note: Falls down into node 5 with no possiblity of quick crumble escape.

note: Position Samus into the bottom right corner, using i-frames to run and jump from the crumble blocks,
and then wall jump to make it onto the ledge.
If using a spike hit to gain i-frames, be sure to be holding forward (left) when landing, in order to get pushed back into the corner.
If using the Ripper to gain i-frames, perform a damage boost from a relatively low position,
in order to land quickly enough to reach the crumble blocks before i-frames run out.

strats.name: XMode Shinespark
strats.note: A short hop from the door can bounce on the crumbles. Just be careful of being pushed back onto the crumble blocks by the spikes.
strats.devNote: Two spike hits are expected per attempt (with any additional leniency hits being multiplied by this amount).

strats.name: HiJumpless Wall Jump
note: Jump into the spike pit, hitting the Ripper to avoid spike damage.
Climb the left wall while avoiding falling onto the spikes or through the crumble blocks. The ledge is the same size of that in writg.

strats.name: Ceiling Bomb Jump Over Spikes
note: Samus can ceiling bomb jump up gentle slopes.
Going down gentle slopes is also possible but harder, instead an unmorph to reset fall speed is recommended here.

strats.name: G-Mode
note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to cross the room.
With Grapple, a running jump then single Grapple swing can be used before PLMs are overloaded, alternatively jump on the crumble blocks and Grapple the Ripper.

strats.name: G-Mode, Kill the Ripper then IBJ
strats.note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to cross the room.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph
strats.note: Bomb horizontally on room entry to jump over the Ripper and land on the crumble blocks, or use a Power Bomb to kill the Ripper.

strats.name: G-Mode, Open Gate
note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to cross the room.
With Grapple, a running jump then single Grapple swing can be used before PLMs are overloaded, alternatively jump on the crumble blocks and Grapple the Ripper.
In indirect G-mode, stand where the gate will spawn and exit G-mode to open the gate.
In direct G-mode, overload PLMs by shooting the gate then position Samus a few pixels away from the gate to where upward diagonal shots go through it.
Crouch then shoot diagonally and quickly exit G-mode (3-7 frames later) to open the gate on G-mode exit.
devNote: The canComplexGMode is only used here to describe opening the gate in direct G-mode without gate glitching.
However, the indirect variant still requires canHeatedGMode or Varia - with Varia, indirect strats can instead be used to go to the top left door and return.

strats.name: G-Mode, Kill the Ripper then IBJ, Open Gate
note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to cross the room.
In indirect G-mode, stand where the gate will spawn and exit G-mode to open the gate.
In direct G-mode, overload PLMs by shooting the gate then position Samus a few pixels away from the gate to where upward diagonal shots go through it.
Crouch then shoot diagonally and quickly exit G-mode (3-7 frames later) to open the gate on G-mode exit.
devNote: The canComplexGMode is only used here to describe opening the gate in direct G-mode without gate glitching.
However, the indirect variant still requires canHeatedGMode or Varia - with Varia, indirect strats can instead be used to go to the top left door and return.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Open Gate
note: Bomb horizontally on room entry to jump over the Ripper and land on the crumble blocks, or use a Power Bomb to kill the Ripper.
In indirect G-mode, stand where the gate will spawn and exit G-mode to open the gate.
In direct G-mode, overload PLMs by shooting the gate then position Samus a few pixels away from the gate to where upward diagonal shots go through it.
Crouch then shoot diagonally and quickly exit G-mode (3-7 frames later) to open the gate on G-mode exit.
devNote: Artificial morph strats can be useful, for instance, in indirect G-mode without heat protection, where Samus needs to collect the item.
The canComplexGMode is only used here to describe opening the gate in direct G-mode without gate glitching.
However, the indirect variant still requires canHeatedGMode or Varia - with Varia, indirect strats can instead be used to go to the top left door and return.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Prepared Remote Acquire
note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to get to the item.
With Grapple, a running jump then single Grapple swing can be used before PLMs are overloaded, alternatively jump on the crumble blocks and Grapple the Ripper.
Avoid touching all 6 crumbles, so Samus can use the item to overload PLMs and go through one of the crumbles to get to the left side of the room.
If the item has already been obtained, Samus can shoot the gate many times to overload PLMs.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Kill the Ripper then IBJ, Prepared Remote Acquire
note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to get to the item.
Avoid touching all 6 crumbles, so Samus can use the item to overload PLMs and go through one of the crumbles to get to the left side of the room.
If the item has already been obtained, Samus can shoot the gate many times to overload PLMs.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Prepared Remote Acquire
note: Bomb horizontally on room entry to jump over the Ripper and land on the crumble blocks, or use a Power Bomb to kill the Ripper.
Avoid touching all 6 crumbles, so Samus can use the item to overload PLMs and go through one of the crumbles to get to the left side of the room.
If the item has already been obtained, Samus can shoot or Bomb the gate many times to overload PLMs.
strats.devNote: This is only useful if the item is Morph, because with Morph, another strat would have been used.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode, Despawn the Gate
note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to cross the room.
With Grapple, a running jump then single Grapple swing can be used before PLMs are overloaded, alternatively jump on the crumble blocks and Grapple the Ripper.
strats.devNote: With Grapple, Morph isn't needed, but there's no reason to go there without Morph.

strats.name: Indirect G-Mode, Despawn the Gate, Kill the Ripper then IBJ
strats.note: Jump onto the crumble blocks to make them solid, then use them as a platform to cross the room.

strats.name: XMode Shinespark
strats.note: A short hop from the ledge can bounce on the crumbles and into the spikes.  Just be careful of being pushed back onto the crumble blocks by the spikes.
strats.devNote: Two spike hits are expected per attempt (with any additional leniency hits being multiplied by this amount).

strats.name: Ceiling Bomb Jump Over Spikes
note: Samus can ceiling bomb jump up gentle slopes.
Going down gentle slopes is also possible but harder, instead an unmorph to reset fall speed is recommended here.

strats.name: Crystal Flash Clip
note: Jump from below the respawning shot block into a Crystal Flash.
Use Grappling Beam as the Crystal Flash finishes to be placed next to the door.
Do not aim down as the Crystal Flash finishes.

strats.name: Kago Farm
strats.devNote: FIXME: There are more possible item combinations.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Remote Acquire Item
strats.note: It is possible to climb the left side of the room with SpeedBooster alone, with either a tricky dash jump or a vertical shinespark.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Remote Acquire Item, Kago Farm
note: With Plasma and a pause abuse, it is possible to kill the Kago and exit G-mode while killing the Kago bugs and make it to the door with a small amount of Energy remaining.
Shoot Plasma and quickly exit G-Mode, so that the bugs die immediately. Avoid having spent much time on the left side of the room, as the Fune fireballs will reduce the number of drops obtained.
Note that it is possible to climb the left side of the room with SpeedBooster alone, with either a tricky dash jump or a vertical shinespark.
devNote: All of these methods are fast enough to be able to escape after obtaining the drops. The shinespark is longer than 1 frame, but is modeled this way because the drops aren't properly modeled.
FIXME: The item that was remote acquired could be Morph, one of the items needed to climb the room, or maybe Plasma.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Remote Acquire Item, Kago Farm
note: With Plasma and a pause abuse, it is possible to kill the Kago and exit G-mode while killing the Kago bugs and make it to the door with a small amount of Energy remaining.
Shoot Plasma and quickly exit G-Mode, so that the bugs die immediately. Avoid having spent much time on the left side of the room, as the Fune fireballs will reduce the number of drops obtained.
strats.devNote: FIXME: The item that was remote acquired could be Morph or maybe Plasma.

strats.name: G-Mode
strats.note: It is possible to climb the left side of the room with SpeedBooster alone, with either a tricky dash jump or a vertical shinespark.

strats.name: G-Mode, Kago Farm
note: With Plasma and a pause abuse, it is possible to kill the Kago and exit G-mode while killing the Kago bugs and make it to the door with a small amount of Energy remaining.
Shoot Plasma and quickly exit G-Mode, so that the bugs die immediately. Avoid having spent much time on the left side of the room, as the Fune fireballs will reduce the number of drops obtained.
Note that it is possible to climb the left side of the room with SpeedBooster alone, with either a tricky dash jump or a vertical shinespark.
strats.devNote: All of these methods are fast enough to be able to escape after obtaining the drops. The shinespark is longer than 1 frame, but is modeled this way because the drops aren't properly modeled.

strats.name: G-Mode, Kago Farm
note: With Plasma and a pause abuse, it is possible to kill the Kago and exit G-mode while killing the Kago bugs and make it to the door with a small amount of Energy remaining.
Shoot Plasma and quickly exit G-Mode, so that the bugs die immediately. Avoid having spent much time on the left side of the room, as the Fune fireballs will reduce the number of drops obtained.

notables.name: Walljump Climb Using the Kamer
note: Wall jump up the left wall and then on the moving platform (Kamer) while avoiding the Fune's fireball.
The Kamers will temporarily move down if Samus is below them, so it is best to walk under the first Kamer before climbing the wall.
It is possible to freeze or kill the Fune with a Super or Power Bomb to make things easier.

notables.name: Shinespark through Wave Beam Door
note: Charge a spark along the bottom of the room and use it to spark through the right side door.
Requires opening the door and shutter first.

notables.name: Hijumpless Spike Speedjump
note: Position Samus into the bottom right corner, using invulnerability frames run then jump while on the crumble blocks.
It is possible to use a damage boost on the Ripper to save energy and position Samus into the corner.

notables.name: HiJumpless Wall Jump
note: Jump into the spike pit, hitting the Ripper to avoid spike damage.
Climb the left wall while avoiding falling onto the spikes or through the crumble blocks. The ledge is the same size of that in writg.

devNote: FIXME: Heat frames could be represented more accurately if a node were added to the left of the morph tunnel (or possibly if node 5 were moved to be on that side):
e.g. this could be used to tighten the Leave Shinecharged or Leave With Temporary Blue strats out through node 2 when coming from the right.
FIXME: It's possible to use a crumble jump to carry temp blue out through node 3.
